summary.para: Gets state information for a band object. Important You should use thumbnail toolbars in new development in place of desk bands, which are not supported as of Windows 7.

param.name: dwBandID
param.para: The identifier of the band, assigned by the container. The band object can retain this value if it is required.

param.name: dwViewMode
param.para: The view mode of the band object. One of the following values:
The band object is being displayed in a horizontal band.
The band object is being displayed in a vertical band.
The band object is being displayed in a floating band.
The band object is being displayed in a transparent band.

param.name: pdbi
param.para: Pointer to a structure that receives the band information for the object. The dwMask member of this structure indicates the specific information that is being requested.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDeskBand

summary.para: Used to obtain information about a band object. Important You should use thumbnail toolbars in new development in place of desk bands, which are not supported as of Windows 7.

remarks.para: This interface also provides the methods of the and interfaces, from which it inherits.
Implement IDeskBand if you are implementing a band object.
You do not call this interface directly. IDeskBand is used by the Shell or the browser to obtain display information for a band object.

member.seealso: Creating Custom Explorer Bars, Tool Bands, and Desk Bands
